Box Hard, Box Fair, Box Safe

Welcome to BoxSafe, your gateway to excellence in boxing officiating and training.

Register as Official
Register as Fighter
Register as Trainer

Box Hard, Box Fair, Box Safe

Welcome to BoxSafe, your gateway to excellence in boxing officiating and training.

Read More

Offers

Box Hard Box Fair BoxSafe

BoxSafe offers top-tier boxing courses for a range of officials. Recognising the crucial role of officials in maintaining the sport’s integrity and safety, BoxSafe leverages over 40 years of experience to provide comprehensive certification programs, aiming to advance careers in boxing officiating. Have a look through 

Training Officiating Courses

Offering affordable, certified courses in all levels of boxing, providing essential knowledge and skills for a successful career in combat sports. With flexible online training, resources include video tutorials, live webinars, and detailed materials. Join a community committed to high standards in boxing officiating and training.

View More

The BoxSafe Gallery

The BoxSafe gallery hosts all of the photos captured at BoxSafe certified events, allowing member present to relive those action-packed memories, and those who weren’t to capture a visual of the high level boxing action. From recognised leagues and title events, all photos can be viewed and purchased for use through the website.

See The Gallery

Competitor Registration

Want to get involved in boxing? Or looking to continue your journey with a current league? All BoxSafe registered leagues conduct their fighter registration through our website. Click below to navigate and find your league, and sign up today.

Sign Up Now

Officiating Pathway

BoxSafe offers progression pathways through its training and officiating certification, allowing you to heighten your experience and become qualified for higher levels of boxing officiation. Read below to see the in depth methods of how BoxSafe can help you progress your career.

See More Detail

Training Officiating Courses

Offering affordable, certified courses in all levels of boxing, providing essential knowledge and skills for a successful career in combat sports. With flexible online training, resources include video tutorials, live webinars, and detailed materials. Join a community committed to high standards in boxing officiating and training.

View More

Competitor Registration​

Want to get involved in boxing? Or looking to continue your journey with a current league? All BoxSafe registered leagues conduct their fighter registration through our website. Click below to navigate and find your league, and sign up today.

Sign Up Now

Tailored Boxing Equipment

Boxing equipment to suit your tournament and gym needs. Whether its boxing gloves and accessories, general equipment, or league uniforms, BoxSafe is your one stop shop for all leagues partnered with us. You can order uniform and gear immediately from the link below. For gym equipment, please make an enquiry at the bottom of the linked page.

See More

Officiating Pathway

BoxSafe offers progression pathways through its training and officiating certification, allowing you to heighten your experience and become qualified for higher levels of boxing officiation. Read below to see the in depth methods of how BoxSafe can help you progress your career.

See More Detail

Officials

The Officials Behind The Champions

Great champions need great officials, and with BoxSafe, you can become one. Our certification helps you learn, grow, and reach new levels in your officiating career. Start your journey with BoxSafe and be part of the team that ensures fairness and professionalism in every fight.

Events

Upcoming Events

The latest with BoxSafe

Want to get involved? Or purely see what’s upcoming? Have a look at our calendar featuring league events, and express your interest in the expression of interest page.

The BoxSafe Community

The BoxSafe community is made up of dedicated members and diverse leagues that work together to elevate the sport of boxing. From trainers and officials to fighters, every role plays a vital part in fostering a safe and inclusive boxing environment.

Victorian Amateur Boxing League

Visit Site

Sunstate Amateur Boxing League

Visit Site

Australian National Amateur Boxing Association

Visit Site

Masters Boxing Victoria

Visit Site

Reviews

BoxSafe Reviews

What do BoxSafe users and league owners have to say about BoxSafe?

Reliable and Professional Service

Regional Boxing Association Official

“BoxSafe’s commitment to professionalism is unmatched. The training provided to our officials is not only comprehensive but also adaptable to real-life scenarios, ensuring that our events are always run smoothly.”

Impressive Training and Officiating Systems

Amateur Boxing League Administrator

“The officiating system developed by BoxSafe is highly efficient and user-friendly. Their training programs have greatly enhanced the quality of our league’s events, making sure every decision made in the ring is fair and justified.”

Trusted Partner for Boxing Officials

Boxing Coach

“BoxSafe provides an excellent service that ensures officials are trained to the highest standards. Their approach is consistent, reliable, and always focused on the safety and fairness of the sport.”

Experience with BoxSafe's Training

Veteran Judge

“Having been in the industry for years, I can confidently say that BoxSafe’s training is the best I’ve encountered. The material is relevant, up-to-date, and always geared toward improving officiating standards.”

Exceptional Training for Officials and Judges

Certified Boxing Judge

“BoxSafe’s training modules are thorough and well-structured, ensuring that every judge is fully prepared for their role in the ring. The resources provided are extensive and easy to understand, making it simple to stay updated with the latest officiating rules and regulations.”

High-Quality Officiating Standards

Referee

“BoxSafe has set a new standard for officiating in boxing. The training is comprehensive, and the continuous support provided to referees ensures that we are confident in making the right calls during matches.”

Professional and Reliable Support

Boxing League Organiser

“The support provided by BoxSafe has been invaluable. Their training programs for officials are well thought out and professionally delivered, helping us maintain the highest standards at our events.”

Innovative Training Programs

New Boxing Official

“As a new official, BoxSafe’s training was a game-changer. The blend of theory and practical sessions made it easy to grasp complex rules. I feel more prepared and confident stepping into the ring.”

Products

Featured Products

From Boxing Courses and Certification, to live streaming action packed events, and state of the art boxing software, BoxSafe has all the essentials in one place.

Contact Us

Have any question or queries? Please don’t be afraid to reach out by clicking this section, and filling out the form. Our team will respond as soon as we can during Melbourne Victorian business hour of 9 am – 5 pm.

Email

support@boxsafe.com.au
